com.boyanstoynov.littlebigspender.main.overview

Class OverviewFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.boyanstoynov.littlebigspender.BaseFragment
        • com.boyanstoynov.littlebigspender.main.overview.OverviewFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.arch.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class OverviewFragment
extends BaseFragment
    Overview fragment which contains a summary of the finances of the user, including net worth, today's cash flow, and this week's cash flow. It also has buttons that can start the add transaction activity. The role of the class is to calculate and populate the various views.
    Author:
    Boyan Stoynov

      Populate the net worth card with data from the database about the balance of all fiat accounts, all crypto accounts and a total balance.

      Populate today's card with data from the database about the total income and total expense for today.
